title: The Simpsons
description: The adventures of a dysfunctional family living in Springfield.

title: Rick and Morty
description: An animated series that follows the exploits of a mad scientist and his good-hearted but fretful grandson.

title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
description: A young boy and his friends travel across the world to defeat the evil Fire Nation and bring peace to the world.

title: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: The misadventures of a talking sea sponge who works at a fast-food restaurant.

title: Teen Titans Go!
description: The zany adventures of the Teen Titans, who are trying to have fun while fighting crime.

title: Adventure Time
description: The adventures of a boy named Finn and his best friend Jake, a shape-shifting dog with magical powers.

title: Gravity Falls
description: Twin siblings Dipper and Mabel Pines are sent to their great-uncle Stan's mysterious town for the summer.

title: The Boondocks
description: The adventures of two African-American children, Huey and Riley Freeman, in a mostly white suburban neighborhood.

title: Bob's Burgers
description: The daily lives of a quirky family who run a hamburger restaurant.

title: Futurama
description: The adventures of a slacker named Fry, who is frozen for 1,000 years and awakens in a futuristic world.
